name: h_commands
caption: Historial Comandos @unit_idx
query: SELECT 8 as ddd, id, device_id, unit_id, command_id, description, status, pending, '' as d, '' as get_info  FROM h_commands WHERE unit_id='@unit_idx'

infoFields.name: brand_id
infoFields.caption: Marca
data: select id, brand from brands ORDER BY brand
